title: Market share of leading smartphone brands in the Netherlands 2017 to 2018
summary: This statistic depicts baxter international 's revenue in 2017 and 2018 , distributed by division . baxter international Inc. is a health company from the country , active in the manufacturing of medical equipment and pharmaceuticals ( until 2014 ) . baxter is headquartered in Deerfield , Illinois .
gold: In 2018 , Samsung was the biggest smartphone brand in the Netherlands with a market share of close to 40 percent . This is a decrease compared to the previous year . Second in the Netherlands was Apple .
